name: Color HEX (Taslia Studio)
description:
Color HEX is SUPER addictive puzzle game with Minimalistic designed approach, which lets you sharpen your mind.

The Goal is to Merge the hexagonal tiles to create or unlock new numbered hexagonal tiles. The challenge increases gradually with large numbered hexagonal tiles. e.g., 512 ➡️1K ➡️2K and so on till Infinity.
The higher the number of the tiles you merge and connect, the higher is the score revenue.

You get to enjoy this amazing new puzzle game while improving your memory, concentration levels and reflexes at the same time.

HOW TO PLAY
You should Merge the tile numbers with same value to each other e.g., 2🔗2 ➡️4
Or you can Merge e.g. 2🔗2🔗4🔗8 ➡️16

FEATURES
- Free to Play
- Minimalistic design with Light and dark theme (changeable through settings)
- Smooth controls-

- Automatic save game to continue at any time
- Global Leader Boards (Google Play Games)
- Exercise your brain and relieve stress
- Challenge your friends & family to reach the top 👑
- No time limits.
- Collect Coins
- No WIFI connection required (Can play offline)
- Use Bombs to continue Playing and destroy and replace some Tiles

___________________

- You will feel the addiction specially when making combo by crushing multiple Color Hexagonal tiles in a row and discover next higher number.
- If you ever love to play match,fills,drop,tiles,stack,sort,smash,merge,mine or 3d games then you will definitely love this.
